lead_paragraph: Before his third-inning ejection on Wednesday night, Harper had hit 10 home runs in his past 12 games, including six in one three-game stretch.

headline.print_headline: Reminder of the Yanks of Old, Not of the Old Ones of Today
headline.main: Bryce Harper Offers Reminder of the Yankees of Old, Not of the Old Ones of Today

snippet: Before his third-inning ejection on Wednesday night, Harper had hit 10 home runs in his past 12 games, including six in one three-game stretch.
abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of The Times column asserts that playing against Washington Nationals and their dynamic outfielder Bryce Harper, who is young, talented, exciting to watch and a juggernaut of offensive prowess, must be a stark reminder for New York Yankees of everything their team is lacking.
